title: Raiden FAQ
description: Frequently asked questions about the Raiden Shogun.

fields.name: Contents
fields.value:
1. Who is Raiden?
2. When will Raiden be released?
3. Is Raiden her real name?

title: 1 | Who is Raiden?
description:
Raiden is the [Shogun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shogun) of [Inazuma](https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Inazuma) and the [Electro Archon](https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Archon) of the Seven, representing the divine ideal of Eternity.

**About her personality**
Ayaka's [voiceline](https://genshin.honeyhunterworld.com/db/char/ayaka/?lang=EN) about Raiden:
> The Almighty Shogun? It would be improper of me to comment, given that I am one of her subjects. All I will say is that... I think that Her Excellency must get lonely on the road to eternity.

Not much is known of her personality at the moment other than her nobility, obsession with pursuing eternity, and her cruelty in conducting the Vision Hunt.

**About her relationships**
In the [1.5 CN Livestream](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV17y4y147fa), it was revealed that she is old friends with [Morax](https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Morax) and [Yae](https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Yae).

She also naturally has a close relationship with her close aide and bodyguard, [Kujou Sara](https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Kujou_Sara).

title: 2 | When will Raiden be released?
description:
[First banner of 2.1](https://twitter.com/SsukunaaA/status/1418590047675191299)

Please wait for official news to be sure of exact banner details.

title: 3 | Is Raiden her real name?
description:
As of the version 1.6, her personal name is believed to be Raiden.

From [Zhongli's voicelines](https://imgur.com/a/dTWwQqi) in the Liyue Archon Quest, we learn that her Archon Name is Baal (as per the demon names in [Ars Goetia]((https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_demons_in_the_Ars_Goetia) ):
> The Electro Archon, Baal

In the same dialogue, we also see that her personal name is Raiden and her title is Shogun: 
> ...since Raiden is also the Shogun of the Inazuma Bakufu, people call her the Raiden Shogun.

Her other title is the Narukami Ogosho.

title: 4 | What is Raiden's skillset?
description:
**Skills:** (Credit to [@Dimbreath](https://twitter.com/dimbreath/status/1418835889854234630))
[Normal Attack 『Origin』](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/E7C3EqcXEAQeOv4?format=jpg) is Polearm
[Elemental Skill『Transcendance: Baleful Light』](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/E7C3h_4XEAIp6d3?format=jpg) does *Electro DMG* to nearby enemies and applies a Xinqiu Q-like buff on all party members that does *AoE Electro DMG* on hit. (100% uptime is trivial because duration is much longer than cooldown)
[Elemental Burst 『Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu 』](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/E7C3gICWUAMVWUU?format=jpg) does *AoE Electro DMG* and swaps weapon to an *Electro-infused* sword that does very high *Electro DMG* and regenerates *Energy* to all party members. Damage done by the burst scales off the number of *Resolve* stacks consumed, which can be gained from other party members using their bursts.

**Passives:** (Credit to ZIntel)
[『Wishes Unnumbered』](https://discord.com/channels/796035266639822879/806208252488319026/868421073073487912) allows Raiden to gain *Resolve* stacks when other party members gain elemental energy from orbs or particles.
-[『Enlightened One』](https://discord.com/channels/796035266639822879/806208252488319026/868421073073487912) allows Raiden to gain for each 1% above 100% Energy Recharge: 0.6% greater Energy restoration from her burst sword and 0.4% Electro DMG Bonus.

**Constellations:** (Credit to [@Dimbreath](https://twitter.com/dimbreath/status/1418835889854234630))
C1 provides 20% more *Resolve* stack gain from all other party member's bursts, and 80% for *Electro* party members.
C2 applies 30% ATK buff on all other party members for 10s after Raiden's burst expires
C4 allows Raiden's burst attacks to ignore 60% of opponents' DEF (damage spike)
C6 allows Raiden's burst attacks to reduce the CD of all other party member's burst by up to a total of 5s.

**Miscellaneous:** (Credit to [@abc64](https://twitter.com/abc64real))
Scales off *Energy Recharge*
Ascension stat is *Electro DMG%*
Signature weapon is [Grasscutter's Light](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/E7DIkgaXEAEivYH?format=png)

**Additional Links:**
[Raiden's animations](https://streamable.com/b6qzqp) by @Dimbreath
[Full Raiden Info on HoneyHunter](https://genshin.honeyhunterworld.com/db/char/shougun/?lang=EN)
